original: spang bar bya ba rnams dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba rnams dor bar bya'o //
translated: One should avoid what is to be avoided.

original: de dag kyang snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su zas dang spyod lam bstan pa bzhin du bya ba dang / thal sman rnon po dang / me btsa' btang ba dang / mes tshig pa la tsha ba zhi bar bya ba dang / tshad bas 'khru ba dang /
analyzed: de dag kyang snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su zas dang spyod lam bstan pa bzhin du bya ba dang / thal sman rnon po dang / me btsa' btang ba dang / mes tshig pa la tsha ba zhi bar bya ba dang / tshad bas 'khru ba dang /
translated: These are to be done as taught in the section on the procedure of oil, and one should administer strong purgation, cauterization, cooling for those burned by fire,

analyzed: slon pa la de bcad pa dang / mi dran cing myos pa la slar dran par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o //
translated: cleansing for those with fever, cutting for those with swelling, and the procedure for regaining consciousness for those who are unconscious and delirious.

analyzed: de bzhin du chu tshan gyi nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa spang bar bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should avoid the use of hot water and so forth.

analyzed: dugs drags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs // brgyal skom skad 'gags yan lag 'jums //

original: mgo 'khor tshigs na rims 'debs shing //
analyzed: mgo 'khor tshigs na rims 'debs shing //
translated: There is dizziness, joint pain, and fever.

original: tshi gu dmar po tal til snang //
analyzed: tshi gu dmar po tal til snang //

original: lums kyis skyug bro bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: lums kyis skyug bro bar 'gyur te //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As it is said:

analyzed: dugs drags shing shas cher bsten pas khrag mkhris 'khrugs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: brgyal ba ni dran pa'o // skad dang yan lag 'jums pa ni /

analyzed: skad gdangs dma' zhing rmya ba'o //
translated: The voice is low and emaciated.

original: mgo 'khor ba ni lam mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mgo 'khor ba ni lam mi gnas pa'o //

original: lhu tshigs na ba ni lhu tshigs na ba'o //
analyzed: lhu tshigs na ba ni lhu tshigs na ba'o //

original: tshi gu dmar po tal til snang bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: tshi gu dmar po tal til snang bar gyur pa ni /

original: de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Such will occur.

original: der ni zhi ba'i sman gyis gso //
analyzed: der ni zhi ba'i sman gyis gso //
translated: There, it is cured by pacifying medicine.🔽Steams, powders, fire cauteries,

original: dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang // tshad 'khru skyug bro brgyal nad gso //
analyzed: dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang // tshad 'khru skyug bro brgyal nad gso //
translated: fevers, diarrhea, vomiting, and fainting are cured.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

analyzed: dugs drags pa las byung ba'i nad khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa la sogs ba zhi bar bya zhing rtse gzhil ba'i sman bya ba dang bcos sbyar bar bya'o //

original: dugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i skabs su zhar la bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: dugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i skabs su zhar la bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is a digression in this section beginning with steam and so on.

analyzed: de dag kyang tshul 'di nyid la brten nas dugs gzhi la ba la sogs pa'i sman bya ste /
translated: These are also treated by relying on this method, like applying a medicinal plaster to the body.

analyzed: dugs gzhil ba'i sman bya ba dang / thal sman rnon po btab pa la de'i tsha bzhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman gtang ba dang / me btsa' la de'i tsha bzhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman gtang ba dang / tshad pas 'khru ba la tshad pas 'khru ba gcod cing smin pa'i sman gtang ba dang /
translated: Medicines are given to relieve the heat of a strong purgative, to relieve the heat of moxibustion, to stop diarrhea caused by a fever and to ripen the medicine.

analyzed: skyug bro ba la de zhi ba'i sman dang / brgyal ba la 'du shes rnyed bar bya ba'i thabs kyis gso'o //
translated: Medicines are given to relieve nausea and to revive someone who has fainted.

original: dugs ni phal cher lci dro rno //
analyzed: dugs ni phal cher lci dro rno //
translated: Purgatives are generally heavy, warm and sharp.

analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i zhi byed yin // gsher @205b zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang // rtsu bcing sra ba dugs sman yin //

analyzed: 'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'byar bag / gsher bag de ni sel byed yin //
translated: Smooth, rough, pacifying and binding are the moistening agents.

original: mdor na phal cher kha ba dang // bska dang mngar ba de sman yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mdor na phal cher kha ba dang // bska dang mngar ba de sman yin // zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: 'dis dugs de bzhi bar bya ba'i cho ga spyir bshad pa yin te /

original: sman gang lci ba dro ba dang rno ba de thams cad ni dugs kyi sman yin la /
analyzed: sman gang lci ba dro ba dang rno ba de thams cad ni dugs kyi sman yin la /
translated: All medicines that are heavy, hot, and sharp are medicines for hot disorders.

original: phal cher zhes smos ba ni /
analyzed: phal cher zhes smos ba ni /
translated: The word “most”

analyzed: la la rnam par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod par bstan pa yin no // de las gzhan pa go bzlog pa dang / yang ba dang / bsil ba dang / rtul ba ni zhi zhing rtse 'jil bar byed pa'i sman yin no //
translated: indicates that there are some that are the opposite.🔽Those that are the opposite of that, light, cool, and smooth, are medicines for pacifying and reducing.

translated: Moreover, from excessive binding and treatment, the skin and

original: // / de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: // / de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: dugs kyi cho ga'i @207b 'og tu skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi cho ga'i le'u brtsams pa ni gang gi phyir /

original: nad de dugs kyis bsrung ba byas nas ni //
analyzed: nad de dugs kyis bsrung ba byas nas ni //
translated: Having protected that disease with sudation,

original: khong du bsdus la sbyar bas dpyis dbyung bya //
analyzed: khong du bsdus la sbyar bas dpyis dbyung bya //
translated: it should be completely removed by applying it internally.

original: zhes 'das ma thag par bshad pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: zhes 'das ma thag par bshad pa gang yin pa de /
translated: That which was just explained

original: spyad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin te /🔽skyug sman ni stod kyi nad bsal ba'i thabs yin la /
analyzed: spyad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin te / skyug sman ni stod kyi nad bsal ba'i thabs yin la /
translated: is explained in order to show what the nature of the practice is.🔽Emetics are the means of removing upper diseases,

original: bkru sman ni smad kyi nad bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: bkru sman ni smad kyi nad bsal ba yin te /
translated: and purgation is for removing lower diseases.

original: de gnyis kyi cho ga ni de dag gi nad las su rung bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi cho ga ni de dag gi nad las su rung bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The procedure of those two is for making those diseases serviceable.

original: de tshangs pa la sogs pas gang du dran pa'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: de tshangs pa la sogs pas gang du dran pa'i cho ga ni /
translated: That procedure which is remembered by Brahma and so forth

original: skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa'i cho ga zhes bya ste /
analyzed: skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa'i cho ga zhes bya ste /
translated: is called the procedure of emetics, purgation, and so forth.

original: de dag bshad cing bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag bshad cing bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Those should be explained and taught.

original: bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi //
analyzed: bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi //
translated: For diseases of phlegm or a combination,

original: bad kan rgyas la skyug sman gtang //
analyzed: bad kan rgyas la skyug sman gtang //
translated: In the case of an increase of phlegm, emetics are to be administered.

original: de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya //
analyzed: de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya //
translated: Likewise, in the case of bile, purgation is to be administered.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this regard,

original: bad kan 'ba' zhig gi nad la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o //🔽yang na ldan pa ste /🔽'dres par gyur pa'i bad kan la rgyas par zhes bya ba bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad dang mkhris pa 'dres pa'i nad ldan ba'am /
analyzed: bad kan 'ba' zhig gi nad la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o // yang na ldan pa ste / 'dres par gyur pa'i bad kan la rgyas par zhes bya ba bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad dang mkhris pa 'dres pa'i nad ldan ba'am /
translated: emetics are to be administered in the case of a disease of only phlegm.🔽Or, they are to be administered in the case of a disease of an increase of phlegm,🔽that is, a disease of a predominance of phlegm, or a disease of a combination of phlegm and bile,

original: bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa'i ldan ba bad kan shas che ba la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa'i ldan ba bad kan shas che ba la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o //
translated: or a disease of a predominance of phlegm, that is, a disease of a combination of phlegm and wind.

original: de bzhin mkhris pa skyug sman gtang //
analyzed: de bzhin mkhris pa skyug sman gtang //
translated: Likewise, in the case of bile, emetics are to be administered.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this regard,

original: de dang 'dra bas na de bzhin te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bas na de bzhin te /
translated: since it is similar to that, it is likewise.

original: bad kan de dag tshul mthun par bya'o //🔽de yang ji ltar bad kan 'ba' zhig la skyug sman bya ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: bad kan de dag tshul mthun par bya'o // de yang ji ltar bad kan 'ba' zhig la skyug sman bya ba yin pa'am /
translated: It is to be done in a manner consistent with that of phlegm.🔽Moreover, just as emetics are to be administered in the case of only phlegm,

original: bad kan shas che ba'i ldan ba'i nad la skyug sman bya ba de bzhin du mkhris pa 'ba' zhig la bkru sman gtang ba'am /
analyzed: bad kan shas che ba'i ldan ba'i nad la skyug sman bya ba de bzhin du mkhris pa 'ba' zhig la bkru sman gtang ba'am /
translated: or emetics are to be administered in the case of a disease of a predominance of phlegm, likewise, purgation is to be administered in the case of only bile,🔽or purgation is to be administered in the case of a predominance of bile, that is, in the case of a disease of a combination of bile and wind.

original: 'dres pa'i nad mkhris pa shas che ba /🔽mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa'i nad dam /
analyzed: 'dres pa'i nad mkhris pa shas che ba / mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa'i nad dam /
translated: For a disorder of the combined hot and bile types,🔽or a disorder of the combined hot and phlegm types,

original: mkhris pa dang rlung 'dres pa'i nad la bkru sman bya'o //
analyzed: mkhris pa dang rlung 'dres pa'i nad la bkru sman bya'o //
translated: or a disorder of the combined hot and wind types, perform purgation.

original: rgyas pa zhes smos pas ni de 'ba' zhig bod pa'am /
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes smos pas ni de 'ba' zhig bod pa'am /
translated: The term “acute” indicates that only that [type of disorder] is to be vomited,

original: rang gi gnas sam gnas gzhan du zhugs pa'i bad kan ni skyug sman bya la /
analyzed: rang gi gnas sam gnas gzhan du zhugs pa'i bad kan ni skyug sman bya la /
translated: or that phlegm that has entered its own location or another location should be vomited.

original: mkhris pa la ni bkru sman bya'o //🔽rims sar tshad 'khru thur du ni //
analyzed: mkhris pa la ni bkru sman bya'o // rims sar tshad 'khru thur du ni //
translated: For the hot type, perform purgation.🔽For acute contagious hot disorders, purgation,🔽for hot disorders with blood vomiting, for lung disorders,

original: mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo gcong dang // mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu //
analyzed: mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo gcong dang // mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu //
translated: for leprosy, for urinary disorders, for smallpox,

original: rkang bam mi dran lud pa can //🔽dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras @208a * //
analyzed: rkang bam mi dran lud pa can // dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras @208a * //
translated: for edema of the legs, for forgetfulness, for sputum,🔽for asthma, for palpitations, for abscesses,

original: mched // nu ma'i nad dang ro stod nad //
analyzed: mched // nu ma'i nad dang ro stod nad //
translated: for breast disorders, and for chest disorders,

original: khyad par du ni skyug sman bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khyad par du ni skyug sman bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: perform vomiting therapy in particular.

original: rims sar pa dang tshad pas 'khru ba la sogs pa nas ro stod kyi nad kyi bar dag la khyad par ram mchog tu skyug sman gtang bar bya ste /
analyzed: rims sar pa dang tshad pas 'khru ba la sogs pa nas ro stod kyi nad kyi bar dag la khyad par ram mchog tu skyug sman gtang bar bya ste /
translated: For acute contagious hot disorders, for hot disorders with vomiting, and so on, up to chest disorders, perform vomiting therapy in particular or to the highest degree.

original: des nad 'di rnams chu dang bral ba'i 'bras ltar mchog tu zad cing dengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des nad 'di rnams chu dang bral ba'i 'bras ltar mchog tu zad cing dengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: These diseases will be completely exhausted and disappear like rice without water.

original: de la rims sar pa ni dang por byung ba'i rims so //
analyzed: de la rims sar pa ni dang por byung ba'i rims so //
translated: In this regard, new fever is the first occurrence of fever.

original: thur du khrag dang mkhris pa 'khru ba ni khrag mkhris kyi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thur du khrag dang mkhris pa 'khru ba ni khrag mkhris kyi 'byung ba'o //
translated: Vomiting blood and bile downwards is the occurrence of blood and bile.

original: thor bu ni 'bras kyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: thor bu ni 'bras kyi phreng ba'o //
translated: Sporadic is a series of boils.

original: rkang bam ni rkang pa'i nad do //
analyzed: rkang bam ni rkang pa'i nad do //
translated: Swelling of the feet is a disease of the feet.

original: skyug sman mi gtang sbrum khong rtsub //
analyzed: skyug sman mi gtang sbrum khong rtsub //
translated: Do not give emetics to pregnant women, as it is rough on the womb.

original: bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba //
analyzed: bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba //
translated: Hunger and constant suffering,

original: byis pa rgan skem sbom snying na //
analyzed: byis pa rgan skem sbom snying na //
translated: in children, the elderly, the emaciated, the obese, and those with heart disease,🔽dry cough, hoarseness, weakness,

original: glo skam smras dang nyam chung dang // rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na //
analyzed: glo skam smras dang nyam chung dang // rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na //
translated: constant indigestion, and spleen disease,

original: rab rib lto na srin bu yod //
analyzed: rab rib lto na srin bu yod //
translated: eye floaters, worms in the stomach,

original: rlung khrag 'dres mar gyen du 'byung //🔽so nams gtong skad 'dzer dang // gcin sri dmu rdzing skran can dang // slon dka' drod che gzhang 'brum can //
analyzed: rlung khrag 'dres mar gyen du 'byung // so nams gtong skad 'dzer dang // gcin sri dmu rdzing skran can dang // slon dka' drod che gzhang 'brum can //
translated: upward movement of mixed wind and blood,🔽teeth problems, hoarseness,🔽urinary retention, dropsy, kidney stones,🔽difficult digestion, high fever, hemorrhoids,

original: rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra //
analyzed: rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra //
translated: dry stools, dizziness, and side pain,

original: rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The sides hurt and there is wind.

original: sbrum ma la sogs pa nas rlung nad can gyi bar dag la skyug sman mi gtang ngo //
analyzed: sbrum ma la sogs pa nas rlung nad can gyi bar dag la skyug sman mi gtang ngo //
translated: Vomiting is not recommended for pregnant women and so on up to those with wind disorders.

original: de la khong rtsub pa la skyug sman btang na /
analyzed: de la khong rtsub pa la skyug sman btang na /
translated: If vomiting is induced in those with a rough stomach,

original: rlung gis yan lag la gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rlung gis yan lag la gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: the wind harms the limbs.

original: phal cher kha zas la sogs pa rtsub mo bsten pas rlung nad skyed pa'i phyir stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phal cher kha zas la sogs pa rtsub mo bsten pas rlung nad skyed pa'i phyir stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because they mostly consume rough food and so on, the wind produces illness and their strength is exhausted.

original: de bzhin du bkres pa dag la skyug sman btang na me'i stobs kyis stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bkres pa dag la skyug sman btang na me'i stobs kyis stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, if vomiting is induced in the hungry, their strength is exhausted by the power of fire.

original: rtag tu sdug bsngal ba ni /
analyzed: rtag tu sdug bsngal ba ni /
translated: Those who are always suffering

original: khur dang rtag tu sdug byed pa'i dub pas stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khur dang rtag tu sdug byed pa'i dub pas stobs zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: have exhausted strength due to the fatigue of always bearing suffering.

original: de bzhin du bzhon pas dub cing nyam chung ba dag la yang stobs phrin shin tu khrag skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzhon pas dub cing nyam chung ba dag la yang stobs phrin shin tu khrag skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, those who are weak and tired from riding have very little strength.

original: byis pa la sogs pas ni sman gyi stobs mi bzod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byis pa la sogs pas ni sman gyi stobs mi bzod pa'i phyir /
translated: Children and so on cannot tolerate the power of medicine.

original: lus kyi stobs zad pas nang gi khong pa skem zhing gcong du 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pa yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi stobs zad pas nang gi khong pa skem zhing gcong du 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pa yin no //
translated: The body's strength is exhausted, the internal organs are emaciated and become withered.

original: na ba ni snying nad kyis nyen pa la byas na snying nad la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na ba ni snying nad kyis nyen pa la byas na snying nad la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one has heart disease, the heart is harmed.

original: rtag tu slon pa ni stod du rgyu ba'i rlung gis gyen du bteg pas de drags na srog zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu slon pa ni stod du rgyu ba'i rlung gis gyen du bteg pas de drags na srog zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is always vomiting, the upward moving wind lifts up, and if it is excessive, life is exhausted.
